name: Gunner Ship
description:
In this game you control a spaceship and have to shoot waves of enemies.

The more ammo you have, the worse your projectiles will get.

Will you be able to unleash the mighty Lazor and rain havoc onto your enemies with just a few shots of ammo left?

Try it now and beat the current highscore of 4360.

Controls

Left Mouse = Shoot

Space = Use Powerups

Use the recoil of your weapons for movement

Credits

Sebastian Kumor (Programming/Art)

Michael Cenger (Programming/Sounds)
